ygData.subject: RE: Uneven experience
ygData.msgSnippet: I have never heard of the distance thing before. I have been far away from the kill sometimes and still have gotten experience. Medding while my Ranger friend
ygData.messageBody:
I have never heard of the distance thing before. I have been far away from
the kill sometimes and still have gotten experience. Medding while my Ranger
friend impatiently tracks something down and kills it.

They may have been green but the were definitely the same "con" to both of
us. As they should be, because "con" is a level distinction. I believe.

Thanks for the thought though.

-----Original Message-----
From: Sirensa Qi'Seraph [mailto:Sirensa@...]
Sent: Thursday, September 30, 1999 2:36 PM
To: EQ-Clerics@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [EQ-Clerics] Uneven experience


From: "Sirensa Qi'Seraph" <Sirensa@...>

Maybe you were not close enough to the legionnaire when it was killed.
There is only so much distance away you can be from the group and still get
experience. Was the Orc blue for the both of you? If it was green that
might explain you both not getting experience...

Just a couple thoughts...

~Siren
